title.rendered: Ipad Charger Plug And Cable USB Wall Plug Block 2Pack 2.1A And 1M Cable for Apple IPhone 12/11/XR/X/Xs Max/8/7/6/6s Plus…

content.rendered:
BSTOEM

Advanced circuitry and in-built safeguards to guard your gadgets towards extreme present, overheating, and over charging.

Universal Compatibility

Designed to work with all fashionable USB powered gadgets from iPhones to Android telephones, tablets, Bluetooth audio system and extra.

6 Month Warranty

【Multi-Protection:】:The multi-protection security system and UL-FCC-CE certification of BSTOEM guarantee a complete safety for customers and their gadgets. This enormously prevents the charger from overheating, overloading, or overcharging.
【Premium Design】:Hard-wearing matte end, high-gloss detailing, this a really premium charger.
【After gross sales service】:If there’s a downside with the product, please contact us in time
